Flying
Whenever you attack, target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a green permanent, instead put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

cards.rules_text:
When The Quindral Accords enters, make a pledge. [i](Create any white, blue, black, red, or green Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)[/i]
Pledge – {3}{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Create a 5/5 Robot artifact creature token named Sentry of the New World that’s all colors, then look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Activate only as a sorcery unless you’re making a pledge.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.
[-1]: You may sacrifice a creature. When you do, return target creature card with equal or lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
[-2]: You may exile a creature card from your graveyard. When you do, Garren deals damage equal to the exiled creature’s power to target creature.

cards.rules_text: When High Senator Talpa enters, choose target opponent. If you control fewer creatures than that player, create a number of 1/1 colorless Soldier creature tokens equal to the difference. If you have fewer cards in hand than that player, draw cards equal to the difference.

Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you may draw that many cards. If you do, discard a card.
Exile two creature cards from your graveyard: Scrapyard Mecha becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
Crew 2

When Survivors of the New World enters, if it isn’t a token, create two tokens that are copies of it.
When Survivors of the New World dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Estrathian Gentrifiers’s power is equal to the number of differently named lands you control.
Whenever Estrathian Gentrifiers enters or attacks, you may sacrifice a basic land. If you do, search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Spend only mana of different colors to cast this spell.
For each color among permanents you control, the first multicolored spell you cast each turn costs one mana of that color less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.

Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
As long as there are five colors among permanents you control, equipped creature has indestructible.
Equip 5. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each of its target’s colors.

[i](This token is white, blue, and black.)[/i]
Pledge – {4}: Surveil 2. Activate only as a sorcery unless you’re making a pledge.
